title: Memory
description: Manage clipboard data, long-term memory, procedures, and fresh context for your AI agents.

empty.title: No clipboard entries
empty.description: Use MCP tools like pluggedin_clipboard_set or pluggedin_clipboard_push to add entries.

form.createDescription: Add a new entry to your clipboard memory.
form.name: Name
form.dropzoneText: Drop a file here or click to browse
form.dropzoneHint: Images, PDFs, JSON, text files up to {{maxSize}}
form.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}
form.fileReadError: Failed to read file. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Clipboard Entry
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{identifier}}"? This action cannot be undone.

clearAllDialog.title: Clear All Clipboard Entries
clearAllDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} clipboard entries? This action cannot be undone.

preview.unsafeImageType: Cannot preview image: Unsupported content type for security reasons.

toast.cannotCopyBinary: Cannot copy binary content to system clipboard

longterm.title: Long-term Memory
longterm.description: Persistent memory that survives across sessions and conversations.

procedures.title: Procedures
procedures.description: Reusable workflows and procedures learned from past interactions.

fresh.title: Fresh Context
fresh.description: Recent context and working memory from current conversations.
